title: Diplomatic staff allowed to travel with service ID- Police
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Diplomatic staff are allowed to submit their service identity card or an electronic document confirming their identity as essential services during the curfew period.
Police Media Spokesperson, Senior DIG Ajith Rohana stated that persons traveling to and from the airport can use their air ticket as the curfew pass.
